text: @IngrahamAngle Excuse me, you and your other FOX News cohorts. The one who supports Trump were following his lead claiming the Covid-19 was a Hoax! Remember that?  We got video of you all calling it a hoax made by them Dems. What’s happening now? Oh yeah the Pandemic!  Shut up you khunt!
